data.title: Colin Firth Movie Marathon - Johnson County Library
data.meta_description: Colin Firth Movie Marathon by JCLPiepieB - a staff-created list : What's admirable about Colin Firth is how versatile he is as an actor - he appears in comedic films such as Bridget Jones' Diary and Mamma Mia, as well as in more serious movies such as The King's Speech and A Single Man. Check out one (or more!) of these for a memorable movie night.
